name: NeuroDungeon (Finnduction)
description:
A small prototype for an educational mobile game I helped create in college. The intent of the game is to help teach medical students about the cranial nerves.

The game is a dungeon crawler in which the player discovers different passages (nerves) answering different questions to progress further into, and learn more about the nerves.

 I worked on the sound design and implementation, some UI design and implementation, and a small amount of level design.
